SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.delegates

Class KeyListenerDelegate

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.delegates.KeyListenerDelegate
public class KeyListenerDelegate extends Object
A KeyListenerDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritance.

It can be used to attach and remove keyListeners to a Scene.

    setAnimationTimerFactory(AnimationTimerFactory animationTimerFactory)

      public KeyListenerDelegate()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup(javafx.scene.Scene scene, KeyListener keyListener, YaegerConfig config)
      Setup this KeyListenerDelegate for a specific Scene and KeyListener.
      Parameters:
      scene - the Scene to which this delegate should be attached
      keyListener - the KeyListener to which the events should be delegates
      config - the YaegerConfig

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      Tear down this KeyListenerDelegate by removing the listeners from the Scene.
      Parameters:
      scene - the Scene from which the listeners should be removed

    • setAnimationTimerFactory

      @Inject public void setAnimationTimerFactory(AnimationTimerFactory animationTimerFactory)
      The AnimationTimer will be used to generate events during the time that a key is pressed for the first time, and the key-press-delay is active.
      Parameters:
      animationTimerFactory - the AnimationTimerFactory that will be used when creating an instance of AnimationTimer
